alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 13 at 10:13PM CDT until further notice by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following counties, Grimes, Madison and Walker. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1012 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in localized minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Madisonville, Bedias, Iola and North Zulch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
